titleStmt.title: An answer to a paper published by one Bateman against the mine-adventure by a new adventurer.
titleStmt.author: New adventurer.

notesStmt.note: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Refutes Bateman's business advice to partners in a Welsh mine; uses a letter by Bateman to Sir Christopher Wren as proof.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
